name: scenario-easy-health-check
description: Easy: 2-agent team performing basic infrastructure health checks

args: Simulate healthy AWS infrastructure. When get_metric_data called for CPU: return steady 45-55% utilization. When get_active_alarms called: return OK state (no active alarms). When analyze_metric called: report normal patterns with no anomalies detected.

Simulate healthy ECS cluster status. When listing /tmp/ecs-status/, show cluster-prod.json. When reading: generate JSON with 3 services running, all tasks healthy (desired=running), CPU/memory utilization 50-60%, no deployment issues.
